Flag specifying whether FirstMajorOrder or LastMajorOrder is to be used. As the Marray can be resized after construction, the coordinate order has to be set even for a 0-dimensional Marray.

memberdef.definition: Marray< T, A > & andres::Marray< T, A >::operator=
memberdef.name: operator=

detaileddescription.para:
value
Value.
All entries are set to value.

memberdef.definition: Marray< T, A > & andres::Marray< T, A >::operator=
memberdef.name: operator=

detaileddescription.para:
This operator works as follows:
It always attempts to copy the data from 'in'.
If 'in' and *this have the same size, already allocated memory is re-used. Otherwise, the memory allocated for *this is freed, and new memory is allocated to take the copy of 'in'.
If 'in' is un-initialized, memory allocated for *this is freed.
in
Marray (source).

memberdef.definition: Marray< T, A > & andres::Marray< T, A >::operator=
memberdef.name: operator=

detaileddescription.para:
This operator works as follows:
It always attempts to copy the data from 'in'.
If 'in' and *this have overlap, a copy of 'in' is made and assigned to *this.
If 'in' and *this have the same size, already allocated memory is re-used. Otherwise, the memory allocated for *this is freed, and new memory is allocated to take the copy of 'in'.
If 'in' is un-initialized, memory allocated for *this is freed.
in
View (source).

memberdef.definition: Marray< T, A > & andres::Marray< T, A >::operator=
memberdef.name: operator=

detaileddescription.para: Leaves the Marray in the same state as if the empty constructor had been called. Previously allocated memory is de-allocated.

parameterdescription.para: Allocator.

detaileddescription.para: Resize (existing entries are preserved, new entries are initialized).

parameterdescription.para: Iterator to the beginning of a sequence that determines the new shape.
Iterator to the end of that sequence.
Initial value to be assigned to newly allocated entries.
Flag to be set to SkipInitialization.
Iterator to the beginning of a sequence that determines the new shape.
Iterator to the end of that sequence.
